indications: Ivermectin cream is indicated for the treatment of inflammatory lesions of rosacea.
contraindications:
Apply to the affected areas of the face once daily. Use a pea-size amount for each area of the face (forehead, chin, nose, each cheek) that is affected. Spread as a thin layer, avoiding the eyes and lips.
                  Ivermectin cream is not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Ivermectin Cream, 1% is a white to pale yellow cream, supplied in a laminated tube with a child resistant cap in the following sizes:
                  30 gram NDC 45802-102-94
                  45 gram NDC 45802-102-84
                  60 gram NDC 45802-102-96
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F), excursions permitted between 15°C and 30°C (59°F and 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
name: Ivermectin
